The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in West Sussex so far as at 18 March is 245,807 (28,330.7 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 13 March, there were 8,561 new confirmed cases (986.7 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 06 March, there were 5,017 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 71% (3,544 extra cases).
